snippet: The LeFrak family is getting closer to completing Newport, a neighborhood that already has 8 office buildings, 13 apartment towers, 2 hotels, a marina, schools, a retail mall and parks.
abstract: Richard LeFrak and his sons are getting closer to completing Newport, Jersey City neighborhood that already has 8 office buildings, 13 apartment towers, 2 hotels and more; over the past quarter-century, the LeFraks and partners have invested billions of dollars in Newport, which has six times as much land as Battery Park City in Lower Manhattan and dwarfs the 26-acre development planned for the West Side.
lead_paragraph: The LeFrak family is getting closer to completing Newport, a neighborhood that already has 8 office buildings, 13 apartment towers, 2 hotels, a marina, schools, a retail mall and parks.

headline.seo: For Newport in Jersey City, Last Phase of Development Begins
headline.main: Jersey City Development, Begun in ’86, Enters Final Phase
headline.print_headline: Jersey City Project, Begun In ’86, Enters Final Phase
